casebody.data:
Dwight James BAUM, Plaintiff in Error, v. FIRST NATIONAL COMPANY OF SARASOTA, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 19, 1928. No. 236. Thomas McCall, of New York City, for plaintiff in error. Loueks, Griffin, Connet & Cullen, of New York City (Wm. H. Griffin, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
